Name: Capture the planet: Cute War
About the game: Have you ever tried to shoot a slingshot? And tried to shoot from a slingshot of fluffy animals? If not, then this game is made especially for you. In the game you have to shoot a slingshot funny animals, in order to destroy the buildings that prevent them from living normally.In this arcade you will find a lot of exciting levels that will not leave indifferent even the most demanding fan of the game. Feature of game - A large number of levels - Beautiful graphics - Lovely animals - Suitable for children and adults - Great background music
